sourcesContent:
<script>
import { onMounted, ref } from "vue";
import Chart from "chart.js/auto";

export default {
  name: "IncomeStatsPage",
  props: {
    transactions: {
      type: Array,
      default: () => [], // 设置默认值为空数组
    },
  },
  setup(props) {
    const incomeTransactions = ref(
        props.transactions?.filter((item) => item.trans_type === "收入") || [] // 如果 transactions 为空，确保不会报错
    );

    // 饼状图绘制
    onMounted(() => {
      if (incomeTransactions.value.length === 0) return; // 如果没有收入数据，直接返回

      const ctx = document.getElementById("incomeChart").getContext("2d");
      const incomeData = incomeTransactions.value.reduce((acc, curr) => {
        const key = curr.goods_name || "其他";
        acc[key] = (acc[key] || 0) + curr.amount;
        return acc;
      }, {});

      new Chart(ctx, {
        type: "pie",
        data: {
          labels: Object.keys(incomeData),
          datasets: [
            {
              label: "收入统计",
              data: Object.values(incomeData),
              backgroundColor: ["#36A2EB", "#FF6384", "#FFCE56", "#4BC0C0"],
            },
          ],
        },
      });
    });

    return { incomeTransactions };
  },
};
</script>
